testsuite.name: 플러시 테스트

testcase.name: 플러쉬와 JPQL (JPQL 호출) - JPQL 쿼리를 실행하면 그 즉시 flush가 된다.

testsuite.system-out:
Hibernate:
drop table auto_member if exists Hibernate:
drop table member if exists Hibernate:
create table auto_member ( id bigint generated by default as identity, name varchar(255), primary key (id) ) Hibernate:
create table member ( id bigint not null, name varchar(255), primary key (id) ) ================ 여기까지는 쿼리가 안 날라간다. (AUTOINCREMENT를 뺀 경우) ================ ================ JPQL을 호출하는 순간 1차 캐싱에서 가져오지 않고 flush하고 조회 쿼리를 통해 가져온다. ================ Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into member (name, id) values (?, ?) Hibernate: /* insert com.binghe.Member */ insert into member (name, id) values (?, ?) Hibernate: /* select m from Member as m */ select member0_.id as id1_1_, member0_.name as name2_1_ from member member0_ Hibernate:
drop table auto_member if exists Hibernate:
drop table member if exists
